channel.title: Product System Design on Ziyue Wang
channel.description: Recent content in Product System Design on Ziyue Wang

item.title: INIS
item.description: Design brief Product system is generated by incorporating smart working light, smart blinds and solar tracking station together. Blinds are adjusted according to the solar position and reflections of buildings. Indoor illumination and colour temperature are regulated based on screened illumination, eliminating unnecessary power consumption and therefore achieving satisfactory results. click to enlarge the image and if not clear enlough, please use the reading mode fo the browser img{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.
